full_summary:
**Title:**
K4C20-240710: Maintenance and Operation of Mechanical and Electrical Systems - MSC Dorval

**Reference Number:**
WS4509799880-Doc4522277251, Amendment Number 2

**Announcement Type:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Environment and Climate Change Canada Department (ECCC), invites proposals for the maintenance and operation of mechanical and electrical systems at the Meteorological Service of Canada (MSC) location in Dorval.

**Project Description:**
The department is seeking an operational team to provide ongoing maintenance and operation services, including minor repairs, to the mechanical and electrical systems, as well as ensure the continuous operation of computer, development, research, and administrative activities.

**Key Criteria:**
Selection will be based on a combined evaluation of technical merit and price. The project period will commence on June 1, 2024, and conclude on May 31, 2025.

**Notice and Procurement Information:**
   * **Public Delivery Location:** Dorval
   * **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
   * **Procurement Method:** Competitive, open bidding
   * **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia, Canada-Ukraine, Canada-Chile, Canada-Korea, Canada-European Union, and World Trade Organization Agreements

   * **Correspondence:** Cossette Fontaine, Jessica (SPAC/PSPC), jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
